title: Leah R Kaplan
text:
(pronounced lay-uh...yes, like the Star Wars character)
I want to understand how we can better leverage emerging transportation technologies for the benefit of, rather than detriment to, society.
I am a PhD Candidate in the Department of Engineering Management and Systems Engineering at the George Washington University and a Fellow with GWUâ€™s Co-Design of Trustworthy AI Systems NSF Research Traineeship. My current research focuses on the potential societal impacts of automated vehicles, with an emphasis on equity and labor.
